products.name: Organic Whole Grain Rolled Oats
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Flakes, Cereal flakes, Rolled flakes, Rolled oats
products.facts: ["Made from 100% organic whole grain oats, ensuring no synthetic pesticides or fertilizers are used.","Sourced from sustainable farms that prioritize eco-friendly farming practices.","High in dietary fiber and essential nutrients, promoting overall health and wellness.","Non-GMO certified, guaranteeing that no genetically modified organisms are present in the product."]

products.name: Sour Cream and Onion Chips
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Snacks, Cereals and potatoes, Salty snacks, Appetizers, Chips and fries, Crisps, Potato crisps, Flavoured potato crisps
products.facts: ["Made with real sour cream and onion seasoning for authentic flavor.","Typically packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Quality ingredients sourced from sustainable farms for better taste and ecology.","Contains no artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring a natural snacking experience."]

products.name: Organic Sprouted Rolled Oats
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Flakes, Cereal flakes, Rolled flakes, Rolled oats
products.labels: No gluten, Organic, Kosher, No GMOs, USDA Organic, Non GMO project, en:vegan
products.facts: ["Organic sprouted rolled oats are made from whole grain oats that have been soaked and allowed to germinate, enhancing their nutritional profile.","The sprouting process increases the bioavailability of nutrients, making them easier for the body to absorb.","Organic farming practices used for these oats promote biodiversity and reduce the use of synthetic pesticides and fertilizers, benefiting the environment.","These oats are minimally processed, ensuring they retain their natural flavor and quality, making them a wholesome choice for a healthy diet."]

products.name: Corn tortillas
products.facts: ["Corn tortillas are made primarily from masa harina, a type of flour made from nixtamalized corn.","They are often gluten-free, making them suitable for individuals with gluten sensitivities or celiac disease.","Corn tortillas have a lower carbon footprint compared to wheat tortillas, as corn cultivation generally requires less water and fewer resources.","Quality corn tortillas should have a soft, pliable texture and a distinct corn flavor, indicating they are made from fresh ingredients."]

products.name: bars
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Confectioneries, Festive foods, Bars, Christmas foods and drinks, Christmas sweets, Chocolate covered coconut balls, en:chocolate-candies
products.labels: No gluten, Vegetarian, Fair trade, No GMOs, Vegan, Non GMO project, Pure cocoa butter, Vegan Action, Vegan Cert
products.facts: ["Bars are often made from a combination of nuts, seeds, and dried fruits, providing a natural source of energy.","Many bars are packaged in recyclable materials, promoting eco-friendliness and reducing waste.","Quality bars typically contain minimal added sugars and preservatives, focusing on whole food ingredients.","Some bars are certified organic, ensuring that the ingredients are grown without synthetic pesticides and fertilizers."]

products.name: Rolled Oats
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Flakes, Cereal flakes, Rolled flakes, Rolled oats
products.facts: ["Rolled oats are made from whole oat groats that are steamed and then rolled into flat flakes.","They are a source of soluble fiber, which can help lower cholesterol levels and improve heart health.","Rolled oats are often grown in sustainable agricultural practices, promoting soil health and reducing chemical use.","The quality of rolled oats is typically assessed by their color, texture, and the absence of contaminants, ensuring a nutritious product."]

products.packaging: Boîte de conserve ou canette,Boîte de conserve
products.facts: ["Made from sustainably sourced tuna","Packaged in recyclable materials","No artificial preservatives or additives","Rich in omega-3 fatty acids for health benefits"]

products.name: Pain de mie extra moelleux
products.ingredients_text: Dextrose, Säuerungsmittel: Weinsäure (L+), rote Beete Saftkonzent - rat, Aroma, Trennmittel: Magnesiumsalze der Speisefettsäuren, Himbeersaft - pulver (0.3%), Apfelsaftpulver (0.3 %), Kokosnussöl. Hergestellt in der Schweiz. Dextrose aus der EU. HD Dextróz tabletta málna - és almaízű Összetevők: dextróz, málna (1,3 %; léporból), savanyúságot szabályozó anyagok: borkősav (L+), céklalé-koncentrátum, alma (0,8 %; léporból), aroma, csomósodást gátló anyagok: zsírsavak magnéziumsói, kókuszolaj. Svájcban gyártva. Dextróz az EU-ból.
